## Core.Albums.add() method

Adds an album, failing if an album with a matching ID already exists.

**Signature:**

```typescript
add(album: TA): Result<TA>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  album | TA | The album to be added. |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;TA&gt;
